top_comments.comment: Lower and higher altitudes of this world are feeling the brunt of it for now, midlanders, you’re next.

comments_since_last_sample.body: Literally you can fried egg outside during hot summer

Kuwait is rich country you can plant trees like SINGAPORE, how they maintain their plants and trees.. you have hire low skilled workers just to water those plants and trees. It’s not too late ya Kuwait.. Salam Kuwait..
